name: Rodrigo Levy
body:
### Skills

**Software**  Ruby, Rails, Active Record, SQL, Git, JavaScript, jQuery

### Final Project
**[Hospitally](http://hospital-mapper.herokuapp.com/)**:  Hospitals charge drastically different amounts for the same procedure. In order to make this data accessible to the public and promote a discussion of the burgeoning cost of healthcare in the US, we've combined the recently released Medicare chargemaster data with government measures of quality, such as patient survey results and outcomes of care, geocoded all addresses, and mapped on Google Maps.  Our team of 4 built this in a week.
**[Hospitally on Github](https://github.com/rodlevy/ops_hospital_mapper)**

More projects: https://github.com/rodlevy?tab=repositories


### Experience

**Dev Bootcamp**
Apr 2013 - July 2013

• 12 week, intensive professional training program for learning Ruby and Rails.
• Technologies used included Ruby, Rails, Active Record, SQL, Git, JavaScript, jQuery
• Emphasis on object-oriented programming, test-driven development, pair-programming and team project work

**BBR Trading/ G-Bar Limited Partners**
Feb 1996 - Nov 2012

• Co-founded and built a volatility-based trading desk. Traded listed equity and ETF options. Started with a team of 4 and grew to a team of 20, with offices in Chicago and New York. 

• Oversaw risk management, trading strategy development and execution. 

• Guided the technology development for our proprietary trading systems and risk management tools. Worked with our CTO to prioritize, test and implement our technology.

• Primary liaison between traders, quantitative analysts and technology department

**Cerrio, LLC**
Jan 2008 - Feb 2012

• Involved in strategic and operational decisions for Cerrio, a Platform-as-a-Service company. Cerrio runs natively in the cloud, and is designed to be the back-end for building real-time mobile and web applications, without any server-side coding.
